name: create Alpaca buy or sell order
Store Flow Variables
create msg.vars for ticker
Hist vars
func:
let shortwindow = 12
let longwindow = 26
let signalwindow = 9
let cnt = 1
let d = new Date().toJSON().slice(0, 10);
//node.warn(d)


let timestamp = d 
let timespan = 'minute'
let symbol = msg.symbol


/* Setup polygon request arguments */
msg.payload = {
    symbol: symbol,
    shortwindow: shortwindow,
    longwindow: longwindow,
    signalwindow: signalwindow,
    limit: cnt,
    timestamp: timestamp,
    timespan: timespan,
}

msg.symbol = symbol
node.warn(msg.payload)

return msg;

name: store Hist
func:
//node.warn(msg.payload.results)
msg.profit = flow.get("profit")
msg.pos = flow.get("pos")
msg.price = flow.get("price")

let ux = 0
let macd = 0
let signal = 0
let hist = 0
let item = 0

for (item of msg.payload.results.values) {
    ux = item.timestamp
    macd = item.value
    signal = item.value
    hist = item.value
}

var unixTimestamp = ux;
var d = new Date(unixTimestamp);
let lt = d.toLocaleTimeString("en-US");


hist = hist.toFixed(3) 
msg.hist = hist
node.warn("Time: " + ux + " Symbol: " +msg.symbol+  " Price:" +msg.price+ " Postion: " +msg.pos+ " Price: " +msg.price)
msg.query = "insert into qqq_macd (datetime, value, position, profit, price) values ('" + lt + "'," + hist + "," + msg.pos + "," + msg.profit + "," + msg.price + ");"
node.warn(msg.query)
return msg;

name: export query
Polygon defaults are: shortwindow-12 longwindow 26    signalwindow 9
trading interval
Get current price of the asset from Polygon
Get lasttrades
display price
trading interval
define values required for adding trade to portfolio
func:
// create a unique algo_id with current unixtime
let d = Date.now()

msg.id = d
msg.login = global.get("login")
msg.ticker = flow.get("symbol")
msg.algo_name = flow.get("algo_name")
msg.asset_class = 'stocks'
msg.number = 1
msg.target = ''
msg.account = flow.get("account")
msg.psize = flow.get("psize")
msg.status = 'running'
msg.algo_type = 'intraday'
msg.benchmark = 'SPY'

return msg;

name: delete from tickers
func:
let id = msg.id
let symbol = msg.ticker
let portfolioname = msg.algo_name
msg.query = "delete from tickers_" +msg.account+ " where symbol like '" +symbol+ "';"
node.warn(msg.query)
msg.symbol = symbol
return msg;

name: delete existing algo
func:
msg.algo_name = flow.get("algo_name")
msg.query = "delete from algos where algo_name = '" +msg.algo_name+ "';"
node.warn(msg.query)
return msg;

name: insert into tickers_paper
func:
let id = msg.id
let symbol = msg.symbol
let portfolioname = msg.algo_name
msg.query = "insert into tickers_" +msg.account+ " (id, symbol, portfolioname) values (" + id + ",'" + symbol + "', '" + portfolioname + "') ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING;"
node.warn(msg.query)
msg.symbol = symbol
return msg;

name: add values to algos table
func:
let id = msg.id
let ticker = msg.tickers
let algo_name = msg.algo_name
let login = msg.login
let asset_class = msg.asset_class
let number = msg.number
let target = msg.target
let account = msg.account
let psize = msg.psize
let algo_type = msg.algo_type
let status = msg.status
let benchmark = msg.benchmark

let benchmark_start = global.get("spy_current")
let sql = "insert into algos (login,id,account,algo_name,algo_type,status,portfolio_size,benchmark,benchmark_start) values "
sql += "('" + login + "','" + id + "','" + account + "','" + algo_name + "','" + algo_type + "','" + status + "','" + psize + "','" + benchmark + "','" + benchmark_start + "') ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING;"
msg.query = sql
node.warn(msg.query)

return msg;

name: create table qqq_macd
export query
